SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,peixunxiangmu.laoshi_id as peixunxiangmuLaoshiId ,peixunxiangmu.peixunxiangmu_uuid_number as peixunxiangmuUuidNumber ,peixunxiangmu.peixunxiangmu_name as peixunxiangmuName ,peixunxiangmu.peixunxiangmu_gongsi as peixunxiangmuGongsi ,peixunxiangmu.peixunxiangmu_gongsi_address as peixunxiangmuGongsiAddress ,peixunxiangmu.peixunxiangmu_peixun_address as peixunxiangmuPeixunAddress ,peixunxiangmu.peixunxiangmu_types as peixunxiangmuTypes ,peixunxiangmu.peixunxiangmu_content as peixunxiangmuContent ,peixunxiangmu.peixun_kaishi_time as peixunKaishiTime ,peixunxiangmu.peixun_jieshu_time as peixunJieshuTime ,peixunxiangmu.peixunxiangmu_delete as peixunxiangmuDelete ,laoshi.laoshi_name as laoshiName ,laoshi.laoshi_phone as laoshiPhone ,laoshi.laoshi_id_number as laoshiIdNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_photo as laoshiPhoto ,laoshi.laoshi_email as laoshiEmail
FROM peixunxiangmu_cailiao a left JOIN peixunxiangmu peixunxiangmu ON a.peixunxiangmu_id = peixunxiangmu.id left JOIN laoshi laoshi ON a.laoshi_id = laoshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId} or peixunxiangmu.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId} )
and ( a.peixunxiangmu_id = #{params.peixunxiangmuId} )
and a.peixunxiangmu_cailiao_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.peixunxiangmuCailiaoUuidNumber},'%')
and a.peixunxiangmu_cailiao_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.peixunxiangmuCailiaoName},'%')
and a.peixunxiangmu_cailiao_types = #{params.peixunxiangmuCailiaoTypes}
and a.peixunxiangmu_cailiao_number >= #{params.peixunxiangmuCailiaoNumberStart}
and a.peixunxiangmu_cailiao_number <= #{params.peixunxiangmuCailiaoNumberEnd}
and a.peixunxiangmu_cailiao_number = #{params.peixunxiangmuCailiaoNumber}
and a.peixunxiangmu_cailiao_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.peixunxiangmuCailiaoContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.peixunxiangmu_id IS NOT NULL
and peixunxiangmu.peixunxiangmu_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.peixunxiangmuUuidNumber},'%')
and peixunxiangmu.peixunxiangmu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.peixunxiangmuName},'%')
and peixunxiangmu.peixunxiangmu_gongsi like CONCAT('%',#{params.peixunxiangmuGongsi},'%')
and peixunxiangmu.peixunxiangmu_gongsi_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.peixunxiangmuGongsiAddress},'%')
and peixunxiangmu.peixunxiangmu_peixun_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.peixunxiangmuPeixunAddress},'%')
and peixunxiangmu.peixunxiangmu_types = #{params.peixunxiangmuTypes}
and peixunxiangmu.peixunxiangmu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.peixunxiangmuContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(peixunxiangmu.peixun_kaishi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.peixunKaishiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(peixunxiangmu.peixun_kaishi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.peixunKaishiTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(peixunxiangmu.peixun_jieshu_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.peixunJieshuTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(peixunxiangmu.peixun_jieshu_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.peixunJieshuTimeEnd})
and peixunxiangmu.peixunxiangmu_delete >= #{params.peixunxiangmuDeleteStart}
and peixunxiangmu.peixunxiangmu_delete <= #{params.peixunxiangmuDeleteEnd}
and peixunxiangmu.peixunxiangmu_delete = #{params.peixunxiangmuDelete}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(peixunxiangmu.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(peixunxiangmu.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.laoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and laoshi.laoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiName},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiPhone},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiIdNumber},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiEmail},'%')
